title: Social Activity Recommendations for Patients
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to recommend social activities based on my patients' interests, so that I can help them stay engaged and connected with their communities, reducing feelings of isolation.

title: Facilitated Communication Channels Between Caregivers and Users
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want efficient communication channels with my patients so that I can monitor their health and maintain connection even from a distance.

title: Event Notifications for Social Engagement Opportunities
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive notifications about social engagement opportunities for my patients so that I can encourage their participation and help reduce feelings of isolation.

title: User-Defined Preferences for Social Interactions
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to set user-defined preferences for social interactions so that I can ensure my patients receive personalized communication and engagement opportunities that align with their interests and comfort levels.

title: Integration with Community Resources for Social Activities
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to connect my patients with local community resources and social activities so that I can help them engage socially and prevent isolation, enhancing their emotional well-being.

title: Feedback Mechanism for Social Features
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to gather feedback from my patients about their use of social features in ALFRED so that I can understand their satisfaction and enhance their experience of social inclusion.

title: Personalized Reminders for Social Engagements
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to send personalized reminders to my patients about upcoming social engagements so that they can stay socially connected and reduce feelings of isolation.

title: Group Communication Support
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to facilitate group communication among my patients and their families so that they can stay connected and support each other, reducing feelings of isolation.

title: User Privacy Settings for Social Interactions
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to manage my patients' privacy settings for social interactions within ALFRED so that I can ensure their personal information is protected while facilitating meaningful connections with their families and friends.
